Name: Hook 2
About the game: Hook 2 is a minimal puzzle game about unhooking the hooks. This time with an extra dimension. Your goal is to remove all the hooks from the board by using various game mechanics that you'll discover along the way. Game has no text, no ads and no scores. Just pure, simple, relaxing puzzles.
Meta Title: Hook 2: Jun 29, 2022, Maciej Targoni and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hook 2? Check out the release date (Jun 29, 2022), developer insights from Maciej Targoni, and a complete game summary.
